projects.heading: Vaccine Tracker - MERN stack app
projects.tagline: Manage clinical vaccine trials, track patients, record vitals
features: Clinical Trials: Users can create new clinical trials by defining a vaccine and specifying its three phases.
Patient Management: Patients can be added to each phase of the clinical trials, tracking their progress through the different stages.
Patient Observations: Users can record observations of patients' vitals, providing valuable data for analysis.

Dashboard: The system generates a comprehensive dashboard on the home page, presenting real-time data visualizations and analytics for monitoring the overall progress and outcomes of the clinical trials.
projects.project_impact: MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). By developing a dashboard and implementing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations, I have gained hands-on experience in building user-friendly interfaces and efficiently managing patient data. This project has allowed me to enhance my skills and proficiency in full-stack web development. I learnt to create basic analytics based on the data available and present it as a dashboard. The impact of this project extends beyond personal growth. It has the potential to streamline the vaccination process, improve patient management, and contribute to better public health outcomes. By providing a comprehensive tracking system, it can assist in monitoring the progress and outcomes of clinical trials, ultimately making a positive difference in people's lives.

projects.heading: Questionner - MERN stack app
projects.tagline: Tech community: Ask, answer, vote for the best solutions.
features: User Authentication: Users can authenticate using their Gmail accounts (on the server-side with Passport).
Question Management: Users can create, edit, and delete question posts.
Voting System: Users can upvote and downvote answers to express their preferences.
Post and Comment Ordering: Posts and comments are displayed in the order of upvotes
Search Functionality: Users can search for specific posts using tags or keywords.
Profile Viewing: Users can view their profiles to see all their activities in one place.
Latest Posts: A preview of the most recent posts are given in the home page as teaser.
projects.project_impact: During this project, I had the opportunity to learn and apply various skills, including implementing Gmail authentication, incorporating a search feature using keyword elastic search, and creating profile pages with personal statistics. This hands-on experience enhanced my understanding of web development and improved my proficiency with the MERN stack. This project, presented as my university final project, has brought recognition for its features, user-friendly interface, and positive impact on knowledge sharing among programmer

projects.heading: E-buy - Django Full Stack Web app
projects.tagline: A fullstack e-commerce website with Django
features: User Authentication: Users can authenticate using their Gmail accounts (on the server-side with Passport).
Question Management: Users can create, edit, and delete question posts.
Voting System: Users can upvote and downvote answers to express their preferences.
Post and Comment Ordering: Posts and comments are displayed in the order of upvotes
Search Functionality: Users can search for specific posts using tags or keywords.
Profile Viewing: Users can view their profiles to see all their activities in one place.
Latest Posts: A preview of the most recent posts are given in the home page as teaser.

projects.heading: Spam/Ham sms detector - Twilio
projects.tagline: Classify an sms sent to the deployed number as spam or ham
features: Dataset Source: The dataset used for training is a spam/ham dataset obtained from Kaggle.
Model: The model used for prediction is a Random Forest model. The model achieved an accuracy of 98% when tested against the test subset of the dataset.
Web Application Integration: The trained model was saved and integrated into a Flask web application.
Deployment Platform: The Flask web application was deployed on AWS Elastic Beanstalk.

Twilio Integration: A free Twilio account was created, and a free mobile number was activated. The deployed web app's link was given to the Twilio account's webhook to enable automatic response to incoming messages.
Message Logs Storage: The message logs were stored on AWS DynamoDB.
User Feedback Collection: Users were asked for feedback on the model's prediction. User evaluations were stored in the database along with the predictions.
projects.project_impact: Based on the successful evaluation and approval, the project was introduced as an assignment in an academic class at UNH, providing students with practical experience in building and deploying machine learning models in real-world applications. This hands-on approach enhanced their understanding of model deployment and data handling, preparing them for industry-relevant challenges.

projects.heading: Let's Chat - Android chat application
projects.tagline: An android app with firebase messaging with Java
features: User Account Creation: Users can sign up for a new account and create a profile with profile pictures.
Friend Search and Adding: The app allows users to search for friends and add them to their friend list.
Real-time Chat: Users can engage in real-time chat with their friends, and the conversation history is stored.
Status Updates: The app provides status update functionality, allowing users to share their current status with friends.
Firebase Firestore Integration: Firebase Firestore was used for storing and handling messages, enabling sending and receiving messages in real-time.
projects.project_impact: The implementation of design patterns like the Observer Pattern for real-time updates and the Adapter Pattern for efficiently handling user listing through RecyclerView showcases advanced software design techniques. Utilizing RecyclerView for user listing optimizes the UI by allowing vertical scrolling with many users while dynamically mapping data to the UI, resulting in a smooth and user-friendly experience.

projects.heading: Sling Racer - Hypercasual mobile game
projects.tagline: Web game built with Javascript game engine phaser
features: Platform: Mobile web game launched on MX player.
Game Play: A simple 2d game where the player needs to turn by latching on to the anchors and time it to avoid getting collided.
Type: Endless game where roads are generated as you go and you aim to beat the high score!
projects.project_impact: Played by more than 100,000 people and turned out to be a commercially successful product

projects.heading: Rage Road - Hypercasual mobile game
projects.tagline: An endless game with C# released as android and iOS app
features: Platform: Game developed for the mobile platform
Game Play: Keep shooting and collecting money to level up. Collect power ups and dodge the boss tank to get a higher score!
Mechanics: Drag to position the car
Collaboration: Worked in a team of 3 with another developer and an artist.
projects.project_impact: Product was a success resulting in expanding the product to other platforms like web and pc.

projects.heading: Pink 360 - A women's only fitness app

Contribution: Flushed out the features and wireframed the app in adobe XD. Effectively communicated and managed the development, marketing, and content team.
projects.project_impact: Downloaded by more than 20,000 people and used regularly. 1000s of clients stayed fit using the app in the pandemic.

projects.heading: Loop it - Unity 2D game
projects.tagline: A game jam product on the theme stuck in a loop
features: Theme: Stuck in a loop - Ludum Dare 47.

Game Play: A simple 2d puzzle where the ball’s starting direction and position are given and you need to adjust the paddle’s rotation to get the ball stuck in an endless loop! Finish it before the timer runs out for bonus
Collaboration: Worked with another developer Anandhi Manivannan and 2D artist Ajeet Krishnan
projects.project_impact: Completed the game on time and got ranked in top 1000 games out of 6500+ games.

Collaboration: Worked with another developer Anandhi Manivannan and 2D artist Madhumitha
projects.project_impact: Completed the game on time and got ranked in top 1000 games out of 7800+ games.
